downloadByUrl #

通过<a> 标签下载文件

Demo #

import {downloadByUrl} from '@vill-v/broswer'

downloadByUrl({
  url: 'https://xxx.xxx.xxx',
  target: '_blank',
  fileName: 'xxx.pdf',
})

DTS #

import {LinkTargetContext} from '@vill-v/ts'

declare function downloadByUrl({url, target, fileName,}: {
  url: string;
  target?: LinkTargetContext;
  fileName?: string;
}): boolean;
downloadByData
downloadByUrlRequest
